title: 3 and Out - Saints/Dolphins MNF Reaction, Jags Job Appeal, Brandon Staley Red Flags, Playoff Stafford Expectations
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Saints/Dolphins MNF Reaction, Jags Job Appeal, Brandon Staley Red Flags, Playoff Stafford Expectations
description:
John reacts to the Dolphins beating up a severely COVID hampered Saints, if the Jags job is better than people think, why Philly HC Nick Sirianni deserves ton of credit, which teams could be looking for new coaches after next season, why he's out on Chargers HC and media darling Brandon Staley, and what he expects to see from Matt Stafford in the playoffs.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
